name: 5 Lives In Chaos
description:
"5 Lives in Chaos" is a game where you have to complete levels within a given time. Each level is based on a diffrent game genra, there are 5 levels. Hope you enjoy my project for this game jam. (It's my first one!) If you could rate it, I wold be very gratefull. Thanks!

(To play in the browser you have to use google chrome)
